titleStmt.title: Judge Doderidges reading of advowsons, or church-livings wherein is set forth, the interests of the parson, patron, and ordinary, &c. : with many other things concerning the matter, as they were delivered at several readings at New -Inne : and now published for a common good.
titleStmt.author: Doddridge, John, Sir, 1555-1628.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. stained, p. [1]-10 faded, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
